ActorTalk: Behold these precise contours, these elegant angles, these surfaces gleaming with brilliant radiance!
Every time I look in the mirror, I can't help but ask myself: how could there be such a perfect creation in the universe?
Oh, isn't that the Gray Raven Commandant? Are you also here to admire this magnificent sight? Come now, don't be shy. Show me your amazement!
(Better play along with its ego and give it some praise)
What an appropriate compliment. It describes me perfectly.
The Gray Raven Commandant is so honest and straightforward, unlike those other self-deluding fools who see my brilliance and deliberately lie to deny its beauty.
Of course! Beautiful things naturally belong with those who appreciate them, but...
I've worked so hard to find the perfect lighting that complements my beauty. It would be such a waste to leave without making the most of it.
Commandant, do you know how to take photos?
Take advantage of this lighting to capture my stunning beauty. Once we've preserved this magnificence, we can proceed to the next location.
Would you come with me now?
